year By Jeff McLane INQUIRER STAFF WRITER DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party and named the Eagles quarterback comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award.`` They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents.'' Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., on Dec. 10 decrying proposed tax cuts is being published by Nation Books as The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class, Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday. The book is to become available in mid-February, while an e-book edition will be available Jan. 28, Nation Books said in a news release. A Familiar User Experience' In announcing the online version, CEO Steve Ballmer said Dynamics CRM is an industry leader because it gives sales professionals a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, and streamlines processes and access to real-time data. The familiarity of the user experience is derived from the use of what Microsoft describes as a`` next-generation native Microsoft Outlook client.''

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
